alert.note: Alert for Mohave (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued March 15 at 5:35PM MST until March 15 at 7:15PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has extended the * Flash Flood Warning for... Southwestern Mohave County in northwestern Arizona... Southeastern Clark County in southern Nevada... * Until 715 PM MST /715 PM PDT/. * At 535 PM MST /535 PM PDT/, Doppler radar indicated more rain moving into the Laughlin Bullhead City area, where flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Bullhead City, Laughlin, Katherine Landing and Big Bend Rec Area. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
